faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Answers to your inquiries about AI Video Captioning

items.title: What types of videos can be captioned?
items.description: Our tool supports various formats including MP4, AVI, and MOV. You can caption anything from YouTube uploads to native video files.

items.title: Is WaveSpeed AI free to use?
items.description: Yes! You receive 20 free captioning credits per day. For heavier users, we offer competitive subscription plans with additional credits.

items.title: Can I edit the generated captions?
items.description: Absolutely! You can review and edit captions to ensure they match your needs and video context.

items.title: How is privacy maintained?
items.description: All video captioning is processed locally within your browser, preventing uploads to external servers and ensuring total privacy.

footer.heading: Ready to Caption Your Videos?
footer.description: Try WaveSpeed AI now and improve your video accessibility effortlessly. No sign-up needed.
